scripts.setup: npm run setup:backend && npm run setup:frontend
scripts.dev:backend: cd backend && PORT=${PORT:-5000} npm run dev
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend

scripts.typecheck: npm run typecheck:backend && npm run typecheck:frontend
scripts.db:migrate: cd backend && npx prisma migrate deploy
scripts.db:reset: cd backend && npx prisma migrate reset
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules backend/node_modules frontend/node_modules backend/dist frontend/build
